summary: Comprehensive testing of 3D animated portfolio site completed successfully. All major features working including Three.js canvas, 3D skill objects, SVG icons, hover effects, animations, navigation, and responsive design.

minor_issues.issue: CV.pdf file not present, download fails gracefully with error handling
minor_issues.note: Feature works correctly but needs CV file to be added

passed_tests: Three.js canvas loads and renders correctly (1920x1080)
Loading screen appears and disappears correctly
Star field and nebula background animations working
All 10 skill cards with correct SVG icons (JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, CSS, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, React Native, VBA, IA Consulting)
3D wireframe objects visible and animated (rotation, floating, orbital motion)
3D objects appear when scrolling to skills section
Skill card hover effects with colored borders and glow
3D objects highlight when hovering corresponding skill cards
Hero section with avatar and typing effect cycling through words
Navigation works correctly (desktop and mobile)
Mobile responsive design with hamburger menu
All 6 project cards displayed correctly
Project modal opens and closes properly
Contact form with all fields functional
Social links (GitHub, Facebook) configured correctly
Demo links open in new tabs
Mouse parallax effect working
Progress dots navigation functional
Scroll animations with GSAP working
Mobile layout adapts correctly (390x844 viewport)
action_item_for_main_agent: Add CV.pdf file to enable CV download functionality. All other features working perfectly.
